about_the_game:
From the stave of Ron Fish (God of War, Batman: Arkham Series), the official music score of Batora: Lost Haven® is the ultimate collection of tracks from the game.

With around 40 minutes of original music, this soundtrack features all the tunes included in Batora: Lost Haven®: it will take you to the emotional path of loss, growth, and hard choices that Avril experiences in the course of her interplanetary journey - with its highs and lows.
The collection is designed in a way that will make you relive this journey, evoking the same sense of duality that permeates the entire game.

After purchasing and downloading this DLC, you can find the soundtrack inside the Batora: Lost Haven® root directory on Steam.
To access this folder, right-click on Batora: Lost Haven® in your Steam library and select ‘properties’. Inside the popup, choose the local files tab and click the browse local files button. You will see the soundtrack in the folder that appears.
